bibl.title: An Emerging New Dialect of Coptic.
bibl.note: Review article of: Iain Gardner, Anthony Alcock & Wolf-Peter Funk (edd.), with a contribution by C.A. Hope & G.E. Bowen, Coptic Documentary Texts from Kellis. Volume 1. P. Kell. V (P. Kell. Copt. 10-52; O. Kell. Copt. 1-2) = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 9 (Oxford, 1999). - Brief observations on specific noteworthy grammatical features. - Notes on individual instances of grammar, idiom and translation: striking or problematic cases.
bibl.seg: Ariel Shisha-Halevy, An Emerging New Dialect of Coptic.
